name: NitroRage
description: NitroRage - crazy multiplayer races with weapons. Destroy your competitors using the minigun, rocket launcher, flamethrower and other guns, or abuse of the machine with a RAM-style Derby. Drive using nitro boosts, jump with springboard on the roofs of buildings, and the demolition of funiture stores and offices, find on the map new...
